Author: insanityiskey85
Name: AI Companion
Description: Private AI chat window. Persona via persona.txt, optional memories.json, color themes (Void Touched), and optional Party/Say routing with trigger + whitelist. Split inbox/reply panes with manual Post to /say or /party. Sentence-aware streaming with queued dispatcher and hard sanitation; ChatGui-first send path fallback to command manager.
